api_research_output_schema.description: Enhanced schema for subagent API research with comprehensive data collection

required_fields.name: string - clean API name
required_fields.description: string - 2-3 sentence summary of what the API provides
required_fields.tags: array - relevant tags for categorization and filtering

technical_info.data_formats: array - supported formats (JSON, XML, CSV, etc.)
technical_info.endpoints: array - list of main endpoint paths with descriptions

content_summary.data_categories: array - specific data types (Economic Data, Academic Publications, etc.)

research_notes.documentation_url: string - link to official API documentation
research_notes.api_summary: string - comprehensive 1-paragraph summary of API capabilities and use cases
